editorialSummary.text: Wireless provider offering cell phones, data plans, Internet devices & accessories.

originalText.text:
Miss Dawn, assistant manager did an exceptional job with handling all of my issues and bringing me back as a T-Mobile customer. And she was very understanding that I was going through chemo and use every ounce of professionalism possible to represent the company. Thank you again Miss Dawn.

You added healing to my stage three cancer

originalText.text: This venue is not diverse enough in it's staff; for the demographic it serves. I'd like to experience a bit more professionalism. The ambiance could be more restorative. Meaning the music could highlight good words and healthy vibes.

originalText.text: I was buying two phones today and my iPhone was syncing for 4hours due to WiFi issues.However, I have to used the restroom and there workers refused me to used the restroom after waiting for the iPhone to be synced. I understand they stored phones in the back however why they didn't stand in front of the door to monitor me to use the restroom. I would never go to that location without them considering people locations is far.

originalText.text: My experience was horrible i was waiting awhile to be helped as one of the employees sat talking about the other employees i then got his name jose by over hearing an employee call to ask him for help and he wasnt happy about having to help would never go to this location again so nasty

text.text: My experience was horrible i was waiting awhile to be helped as one of the employees sat talking about the other employees i then got his name jose by over hearing an employee call to ask him for help and he wasnt happy about having to help would never go to this location again so nasty

originalText.text: So I had my phone ordered by the store rep to be delivered at the store, as I am tracking the order the delivery couldn’t be done because the address was input wrong. I called to speak to one of the store rep and I had to explain the situation over the phone three times because the person I initially spoke with the information right thru her small brain, so instead of helping me and looking for the information they first laugh at me while I’m on the phone, and told me to call 611, I felt powerless and humiliated. I reported them over the phone, and now I’m leaving my honest review. This is not how you take care of customer. T-Mobile better hire less guetto people that actually want to do their work. Very unprofessional, and lack of class.
